# Layout Refactoring Spec - UI/UX Pro Max Design System

## Design System (Generated by ui-ux-pro-max)

### Style: Accessible & Ethical
- High contrast, large text (16px+), keyboard navigation
- WCAG AAA compliant, semantic HTML
- Best for: Healthcare, medical clinics, health apps
- Performance: Excellent

### Color Palette: Healthcare App
```
Primary:    #0891B2  (calm cyan/teal - Tailwind cyan-600)
Secondary:  #22D3EE  (lighter cyan - Tailwind cyan-400)
CTA/Success:#059669  (health green - Tailwind emerald-600)
Background: #ECFEFF  (light cyan tint - Tailwind cyan-50)
Text:       #164E63  (deep cyan - Tailwind cyan-900)
```

### oklch Conversion for CSS Variables
```css
/* Light Mode */
--primary: oklch(0.609 0.126 192.5);     /* #0891B2 - cyan-600 */
--primary-foreground: oklch(0.985 0.009 192.5); /* white */
--background: oklch(0.984 0.014 192.5);  /* #ECFEFF - cyan-50 */
--foreground: oklch(0.327 0.065 192.5);  /* #164E63 - cyan-900 */
--card: oklch(1.0 0 0);                  /* white */
--card-foreground: oklch(0.327 0.065 192.5);
--muted: oklch(0.948 0.022 192.5);       /* cyan-100 */
--muted-foreground: oklch(0.505 0.079 192.5); /* cyan-700 */
--accent: oklch(0.948 0.022 192.5);      /* cyan-100 */
--border: oklch(0.908 0.040 192.5);      /* cyan-200 */
--destructive: oklch(0.577 0.245 27.325);/* red-600 */
--ring: oklch(0.609 0.126 192.5 / 0.3);

/* Dark Mode */
--primary: oklch(0.715 0.143 192.5);     /* cyan-400 #22D3EE */
--primary-foreground: oklch(0.15 0.04 192.5);
--background: oklch(0.12 0.04 192.5);    /* very dark cyan */
--foreground: oklch(0.94 0.02 192.5);
--card: oklch(0.16 0.04 192.5);
--card-foreground: oklch(0.94 0.02 192.5);
--muted: oklch(0.20 0.04 192.5);
--muted-foreground: oklch(0.70 0.05 192.5);
--accent: oklch(0.22 0.05 192.5);
--border: oklch(0.28 0.05 192.5);
--ring: oklch(0.715 0.143 192.5 / 0.4);
```

### Chart Colors
```css
/* Light */
--chart-1: oklch(0.609 0.126 192.5);  /* Cyan/Teal (primary) */
--chart-2: oklch(0.596 0.145 163.2);  /* Emerald */

--chart-4: oklch(0.705 0.213 47.6);   /* Amber */
--chart-5: oklch(0.6 0.2 340);        /* Pink */

/* Dark - slightly brighter variants */
--chart-1: oklch(0.715 0.143 192.5);
--chart-2: oklch(0.696 0.17 163.2);
--chart-3: oklch(0.65 0.22 250);
--chart-4: oklch(0.76 0.18 55);
--chart-5: oklch(0.7 0.22 340);
```

### Sidebar Colors
```css
/* Light */

--sidebar-foreground: oklch(0.327 0.065 192.5);
--sidebar-primary: oklch(0.609 0.126 192.5);
--sidebar-primary-foreground: oklch(0.985 0.009 192.5);
--sidebar-accent: oklch(0.94 0.02 192.5);
--sidebar-accent-foreground: oklch(0.4 0.08 192.5);
--sidebar-border: oklch(0.90 0.03 192.5);
--sidebar-ring: oklch(0.609 0.126 192.5 / 0.2);

/* Dark */

--sidebar-foreground: oklch(0.94 0.02 192.5);
--sidebar-primary: oklch(0.715 0.143 192.5);
--sidebar-primary-foreground: oklch(0.15 0.04 192.5);
--sidebar-accent: oklch(0.20 0.05 192.5);
--sidebar-accent-foreground: oklch(0.94 0.02 192.5);
--sidebar-border: oklch(0.28 0.05 192.5);
--sidebar-ring: oklch(0.715 0.143 192.5 / 0.4);
```

## Anti-Patterns to REMOVE from Current Code

### 1. Neon Glow Shadows (REMOVE ALL)
```
shadow-[0_0_10px_var(--color-primary)]
shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(var(--primary),0.1)]
shadow-[0_0_8px_rgba(16,185,129,0.5)]
```
Replace with: `shadow-sm`, `shadow-md`, or `shadow-lg` (standard Tailwind)

### 2. Purple Gradients (REMOVE ALL)
```
bg-gradient-to-r from-primary to-purple-400
bg-gradient-to-br from-primary/10 to-purple-500/10
bg-purple-500/10, bg-purple-500/5
```
Replace with: solid colors or subtle teal gradients `from-primary/5 to-cyan-500/5`

### 3. Invisible Light Mode Elements (FIX ALL)
```
bg-white/5   → bg-muted or bg-accent
bg-white/10  → bg-muted/50 or border-border
border-white/10 → border-border
border-white/5  → border-border/50
```

### 4. animate-pulse on Non-Loading Elements (REMOVE)
```
animate-pulse on the green dot in sidebar header
animate-pulse on dashboard summary card icons
```
Only use animate-pulse for skeleton loaders.

### 5. mix-blend-screen Decorative Blobs (REMOVE)
The decorative background blobs don't render properly in light mode.
Remove entirely or replace with subtle CSS gradients on the body.

## Component Architecture

### Extract to `/src/components/layout/`:
1. `app-sidebar.tsx` - Using shadcn/ui Sidebar component (SidebarProvider pattern)
2. `app-header.tsx` - Extracted header with clinic name, theme toggle, logout
3. `page-header.tsx` - Reusable page title component `<PageHeader title="..." description="..." />`

### shadcn/ui Sidebar Pattern
Install the sidebar component: `npx shadcn@latest add sidebar`
Use `SidebarProvider` + `Sidebar` + `SidebarContent` + `SidebarGroup` + `SidebarMenuItem`

### Page Content Container
Add `max-w-7xl mx-auto` wrapper to the main content area for proper reading width on large screens.

## Typography
Current: Geist / Geist Mono (too tech-y for healthcare)
Recommendation: Keep Geist for now (it's clean enough), but ensure:
- Body text: 16px minimum
- Line height: 1.5-1.75 for body
- Heading hierarchy: clear size steps (text-3xl, text-2xl, text-xl, text-lg)
- Max line length: 65-75 characters (use max-w-prose where appropriate)

## Key UX Rules
1. NO continuous animations on decorative elements (only on loading indicators)
2. Transitions: 150-300ms for micro-interactions
3. Touch targets: minimum 44x44px
4. Focus rings: visible 3-4px rings on all interactive elements
5. `prefers-reduced-motion`: respect by reducing/removing animations
6. Skeleton screens for loading states (already implemented - keep)
7. cursor-pointer on all clickable/hoverable cards and interactive elements
